synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir explore the complexities of work-life balance, sharing their personal experiences and insights on managing mental health in a demanding world. They emphasize the importance of self-awareness, compassion, and finding joy in the journey of life, ultimately encouraging listeners to redefine their relationships with work and leisure.
quotes: Work-life balance is about you; it's your life.
What would love have me do today?
If you're working so much, it's like you stop feeding your soul.
You can’t create anything if you’re constantly consuming.
It’s not about the number of hours worked, but the quality of your time spent.
Life happens between the work hard and play hard.
You deserve to feel whole and full at the end of the day.
We have to keep advocating for a life where no one struggles to survive.
When you take a step back, you can see more clearly where you're actually at.
Sometimes, the most creative mind is a bored mind.
